short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monsta X Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Monsta X background. Monsta X wallpaper background theme for Kpop fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically change Monsta X wallpaper each time a new tab is opened.
2. Toggle between a random Monsta X background or select your favorite in the wallpaper panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Convenient access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add and access favorite websites quickly.
10. Direct access to Google apps.
11. Explore more themes easily.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Instant wallpaper downloads.
14. Quick links to online gaming.
15. Activate seasonal animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on the Monsta X new tab.
